results.content: I was looking for a beginner's overview on how to build a Joomla site and this course was perfect for that. The only things I would suggest to make it better (although this is not the instructor's fault) but some of the plugins mentioned are no longer available. Maybe add some suggestions for current alternatives. Also a little more information on the Gantry framework itself would be nice. Overall I found the course quite helpful.
results.content_html: I was looking for a beginner's overview on how to build a Joomla site and this course was perfect for that. The only things I would suggest to make it better (although this is not the instructor's fault) but some of the plugins mentioned are no longer available. Maybe add some suggestions for current alternatives. Also a little more information on the Gantry framework itself would be nice. Overall I found the course quite helpful.

results.content: Clear and understandable instructions accompanied by good visual demo penetration. Step by step and nicely divided in relative short videos.
results.content_html: Clear and understandable instructions accompanied by good visual demo penetration. Step by step and nicely divided in relative short videos.

results.content:
Overall I enjoyed this course, even though it is nearly 2 years old.

I liked Glen's teaching style and pace was just right for me.

I learnt quite a  lot about using the Joomla backend, covering things better than other tutorials that just whizzed over them or not explaining clearly enough.
I did think there would be more on actually using Gantry 5, rather than just using Gantry 5 with the free Helium Template. Don't get me wrong it is a good template and Gantry does look like a superb framework for creating site layouts but wish there had been more on using it.

I found that the website that this tutorial is  based on has changed since the video and therefore certain things in the tutorial do not match.
If all the resources for site had been supplied, that would have made it easier to follow along.
If resources had been supplied then there  would have been no need to include the usage of Gimp etc. even though it was a nice touch for beginners to see how you can easily create simple graphics etc. for a website.

Some of the extensions used that were free are either now paid for or not available. Again this made it hard to follow along and I actually wanted to skip certain parts.

Not bad but improvements could be made. If these are done I would change my vote.
results.content_html:
Overall I enjoyed this course, even though it is nearly 2 years old.

I liked Glen's teaching style and pace was just right for me.

I learnt quite a lot about using the Joomla backend, covering things better than other tutorials that just whizzed over them or not explaining clearly enough.
I did think there would be more on actually using Gantry 5, rather than just using Gantry 5 with the free Helium Template. Don't get me wrong it is a good template and Gantry does look like a superb framework for creating site layouts but wish there had been more on using it.

I found that the website that this tutorial is based on has changed since the video and therefore certain things in the tutorial do not match.
If all the resources for site had been supplied, that would have made it easier to follow along.
If resources had been supplied then there would have been no need to include the usage of Gimp etc. even though it was a nice touch for beginners to see how you can easily create simple graphics etc. for a website.

Some of the extensions used that were free are either now paid for or not available. Again this made it hard to follow along and I actually wanted to skip certain parts.

Not bad but improvements could be made. If these are done I would change my vote.

results.content:
Rather basic, although some useful free tools were pointed out. The real world example is not very modern (maybe just my personal opinion) and seemed like the author worked there.

Just a pity as I was expecting more...

response.content: If you have time, please tell me how you would like improve this course. I would like to gain 5 stars from everyone.

results.content: I think the title is a little misleading. I am new to Gantry but not new to Joomla. I wanted to learn about building a site in Gantry Helium. However it was mostly about building a Joomla site and less focus on Gantry. So for the novice I would say this is a pretty good instructional on how to build a site using Joomla, and gives a lot of useful tools. However if you are looking for a course specifically learning Gantry and you already know Joomla this is probably not the right fit. I'm giving it 4 stars mainly b/c it even though it was not what I expected, the instructor covered the basics very clearly. Though if I were to rate it purely on Gantry I would give it 2-1/2 to 3 stars because it didn't cover very much in that respect.

results.content: So far so good.  I am an advanced Joomla user but never used Gantry nor Rocket Theme.  My preferred site is JoomlaBamboo.  But it's great to expand my skill set and I think I'm well on my way.
